name: Sourdough Bread
description: Our classic sourdough bread is made with a wild yeast starter and slow fermentation for a tangy and chewy texture.

name: Baguette
description: Our crispy baguette is perfect for sandwiches or dipping into olive oil and balsamic vinegar.

name: Croissant
description: Our flaky and buttery croissants are perfect for breakfast or as a snack.

name: Cinnamon Raisin Bread
description: Our cinnamon raisin bread is perfect for toast or as a sweet treat.

name: Whole Wheat Bread
description: Our whole wheat bread is made with 100% whole grain flour for a healthy and hearty option.

name: Focaccia Bread
description: Our focaccia bread is topped with olive oil, sea salt, and herbs for a delicious and savory flavor.
